data.title: TaubelLegal
data.meta_description: TAUBEL LEGAL is a law firm providing integrated highly professional legal services for Czech and foreign clients in almost all areas related to their business activities.
data.text:
We have been cooperating with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL for many years. We have always valued not only their professional approach, but also their prompt reactions to our requirements. All of their employees are highly knowledgeable and experienced and their legal advice has always helped us to arrive at the right decisions in important matters. We really appreciate their support in all fields where a legal point-of view is necessary. Not only regarding contracts of any type, but also regarding for instance GDPR. I would especially like to stress their professionalism, experience and sense of perspective, thanks to which we were able to successfully manage the implementation of this regulation.

I have been cooperating with the company TAUBEL LEGAL for many years, namely since its establishment. Even though I have had the opportunity to cooperate with a number of renowned law firms over the course of my professional career, I appreciate that Jan and his entire teamâ€˜s professionalism and legal erudition on the one hand, while at the same time, on the other, I appreciate their pro-client approach

We had the opportunity to cooperate with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL on a crowd-investment project that was a huge challenge to work on from the legal as well as organizational standpoint. All members of the TAUBEL LEGAL team were professional and at the same time constructive in any (even non-standard) situation. Their pro-active approach and willingness to assist us really simplified the closing of the transaction for us. We are already looking forward to our next collaboration

The law firm TAUBEL LEGAL has always been able to offer us elegant solutions required during the resolution of legal issues. What I particularly value about the TAUBEL LEGAL team is how they can interlink legal theory and the practical aspect of a matter.

Cee tax group has been cooperating with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL for many years. Even though TAUBEL LEGAL has often had to consider the provision of legal services at short notice, a complex task or the drawing up of documentation in a foreign language, their approach has always been highly professional, technically precise and our collaboration has always been very friendly.

Having a good lawyer gives me a feeling of security. I can fully put my mind to doing business because I know that I have got my back covered. At TAUBEL LEGAL they know what they are doing. They are fast, 100 per cent professional, and most importantly, they can save me a tremendous amount of time, they solve each problem quickly with the minimum need for my involvement.

When choosing a law firm we emphasize the complexity of provided services and the quality of work. On the basis of a long-term working relationship I can state that the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL has exceeded my expectations. While providing legal services, the TAUBEL LEGAL team does not overload us with empty phrases, but provides practical and realisable solutions to a problem. They approach all cases in a really responsible manner, they inform us in advance of the anticipated approach and solution. I value their operative, flexible approach and prompt communication. I cannot recommend their services highly enough.

We have had the opportunity to repeatedly cooperate with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL over many years. Whether in the field of commercial or labour law, we have been completely satisfied each and every time with the level of service provided. Promptness, reliability, and flexibility in finding the best solution are always a standard part of the service.

We have been using the services of the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL for almost a year and we greatly appreciate their flexibility and pro-active approach. Their emphasis on detail and a business-like way of thinking are very important to us.

We have been working with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL since 2011. For the entire length of our collaboration they have provided valuable support in legal issues. During this time we have had the opportunity to cooperate in various fields (labour law, mergers and acquisitions, tenders, administration of claims etc.). We have always been very satisfied with the quality of services provided. We appreciate in particular their flexible approach, discretion, expertise and reliability. I can warmly recommend the services of the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL.

The law firm TAUBEL LEGAL has provided our company with complex legal consultancy since its establishment. They have been responsible for the preparation of all essential contractual documentation, the revision of our business partnersâ€™ contracts, the settlement of employer/employee relationships up to the enforcement of claims. We are utterly satisfied with our collaboration. The services provided are prompt, professional and each time very precise. The attorneys really understand their job. I would warmly recommend the services of the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL to anyone interested in quality legal representation.

Our company has been using the services of the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL for a long time. We are really satisfied with the quality of their work â€“ whether it is representation in legal disputes, the preparation of different contractual documentation, employment agenda and other fields. It is a modern law firm with a dynamic team, which always tries to think a few steps ahead with an overlap into situations that donâ€™t even occur to you as a client. The current business environment is so fast and complicated that we could not get by without quality legal support. Their expert advice as well as their professional and complex approach allows us to focus on the prosperity of our company.

The members of the TAUBEL LEGAL team have an outstanding knowledge of law and a highly professional approach. They really make the effort to provide the best legal services they can, all with a friendly and at the same time professional approach. I would definitely recommend their services.

We repeatedly turn to the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL in connection with various aspects of our activities. They are always highly professional while working with us and on top of that they accommodate us with reasonable rates with respect to the fact that we operate in the field of education.

We have been collaborating with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL for many years and we are very satisfied with their services. They have a highly competent, perfectly equipped team especially skilled in foreign languages, which is absolutely essential to us, as a company based in Germany but also a member of a global group operating worldwide.

We have been cooperating with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL since it was founded, each time to our complete satisfaction. Working with TAUBEL LEGAL is not only beneficial to us in business and legal terms, but also pleasant. In addition to successful outcomes in commercial disputes, the TAUBEL LEGAL team is always prompt with their answers, flexible in terms of time and expertly reliable. The team comes up with proposals and ideas for solutions to business situations that give us a new perspective on the given issue and broaden our options in order to make progress in legal issues. Thanks to their approach we consider them to be more a part of our team rather than simply an external supplier.

As a public benefit organisation, we have specialised legal obligations to fulfil and have to rely on the advice and support of our legal advisers to ensure we comply. TAUBEL LEGAL has been extremely helpful - not only do they understand the legislation thoroughly; their excellent English means that they can explain it clearly to us non-fluent Czech speakers. To be able to explain often highly technical, obscure legal procedures in oneâ€™s second language, so that a non-legal expert can understand them, is indeed a great skill. And just as importantly, their unfailing meeting of deadlines is something that we, as probably one of TAUBEL LEGAL smaller clients, greatly appreciate.

I have cooperated with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL on several transactions and I particularly value their professional approach and commitment to work. Aside from JUDr. TÃ¤ubelâ€™s legal and negotiation skills, I also value his ability from a commercial standpoint.

We have been cooperating with the law firm TAUBEL LEGAL for eight years. During this relatively long period they have dealt with a number of projects and cases for us (for instance in the fields of M&A, real estate, contractual and contentious matters), always with a maximum professionalism and helpfulness.

We consulted TAUBEL LEGAL on questions regarding GDPR. I particularly value how quickly they grasped all the specifics of our business as an HR agency and we received recommendations which were decidedly tailor-made for us. Thanks to their pro-client approach we had everything we needed in as short a time as possible.

JUDr. Jan TÃ¤ubel, LL.M. is an attorney and the founding partner of TAUBEL LEGAL. From 2003 to 2009 Jan worked for the law firm Allen & Overy. In 2001 he graduated from the Faculty of Law at Charles University in Prague. He composed his doctor thesis in the field of European law. Jan also studied law at the Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-UniversitÃ¤t Bonn and Humboldt UniversitÃ¤t zu Berlin, where he received an LL.M. degree in 2003. Jan specializes in the field of corporate law, M&A and real estate. Jan speaks fluent English and German.

JUDr. Lucie ÄŒervenÃ¡ is a lawyer at TAUBEL LEGAL. She joined TAUBEL LEGAL while studying as a paralegal in 2017. In 2021 Lucie graduated from the Faculty of Law at Charles University in Prague. She defended her doctor thesis in the field of Commercial law and obtained the degree of JUDr. in 2022. She focuses on corporate law, civil and employment law, M&A and real estate. She speaks fluent English.

Mgr. Adam SochÅ¯rek is a lawyer at TAUBEL LEGAL. Adam completed his studies at the Faculty of Law at Charles University in Prague in 2022. He also studied abroad at the Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-UniversitÃ¤t in Bonn. He focuses mainly on civil, commercial, labour and real estate law. He is fluent in English and German.
